presentation.summary: TYPO3 is the most advanced GPL content management framework available.
presentation.description: TYPO3 is developed by the Danish programmer Kasper Skaarhoej. It is the most advanced GPL content management framework available and successfully competes with commercial products sold at US$50,000. TYPO3 is distributed under the GPL license. However, Kasper has expressed certain aims for the system that we ask you to respect (see typo3.com for more information).

version.entry: Changelog: https://wiki.typo3.org/TYPO3_CMS_8.7.13
Please follow this instruction before upgrading: http://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/InstallationGuide/UpgradeLTS/Preparation/Index.html#extensions
After the application is updated, some extensions might be switched off. Please make sure that all the required extensions are switched on and are updated to the latest version after upgrade.

setting.name: Administrator's login
setting.error-message: Please make sure the text you entered starts with a letter and continues with either numbers, letters, underscores or hyphens.
